args.content:
import Mathlib

open Matrix

/-- Let A be an orthogonal n√ón real matrix (A·µÄ * A = I). Then its columns form an orthonormal family (and hence an orthonormal basis) of ‚Ñù^n. -/
theorem orthonormal_cols_of_orthogonal {n : Type*} [Fintype n] (A : Matrix n n ‚Ñù)
  (h : A.transpose * A = 1) : Orthonormal ‚Ñù fun i => A.col i := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Matrix
open Submodule

/-- Let A be an orthogonal n√ón real matrix (A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1). Then its columns form an orthonormal family (and hence an orthonormal basis) of ‚Ñù^n. -/
theorem orthonormal_cols_of_orthogonal (n : Nat) (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)
  (h : A.transpose ‚¨ù A = 1) :
  Orthonormal ‚Ñù fun i : Fin n => A.col i ‚àß span ‚Ñù (Set.range fun i : Fin n => A.col i) = (‚ä§ : Submodule ‚Ñù (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Matrix
open Submodule

/-- Let A be an orthogonal n√ón real matrix (A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1). Then its columns form an orthonormal family (and hence an orthonormal basis) of ‚Ñù^n. -/
theorem orthonormal_cols_of_orthogonal (n : Nat) (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)
  [DecidableEq (Fin n)] [InnerProductSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)]
  (h : A.transpose ‚¨ù A = 1) :
  (Orthonormal ‚Ñù fun i : Fin n => A.col i) ‚àß span ‚Ñù (Set.range fun i : Fin n => A.col i) = (‚ä§ : Submodule ‚Ñù (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Matrix

/-- Let A be an orthogonal n√ón real matrix (A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1). Then its columns form an orthonormal family and span ‚Ñù^n. -/
theorem orthonormal_cols_of_orthogonal (n : Nat) [DecidableEq (Fin n)]
  [InnerProductSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)] (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù) (h : A.transpose ‚¨ù A = 1) :
  Orthonormal ‚Ñù (fun i : Fin n => A.col i) ‚àß span ‚Ñù (Set.range fun i : Fin n => A.col i) = (‚ä§ : Submodule ‚Ñù (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) := by
  sorry
